Illustrations

  1. Antidote

    She left, dark it became

    In my heart, this is where I hold you

    Little that we knew

    We’re all in our private traps

    Orders

    Where do lovers go

    Aperture Treatments

  2. We are who we lose

    Wave

    ‎‏ Had we one day become apart

    She’s Happy, he’s sad. He’s happy, she’s sad

    We were perfect, we were imperfect

    There are people whom are here to stay

    And here am I fixated

    I’m afraid that they will not convene
